description: The Natural Resources Canada Fuels Diversity Division is seeking the development and implementation of a grants and contributions solution. Work is currently not being performed by a contracted resource (ref: 174296, 5000070501)
full_summary:
Title: Natural Resources Canada Solicitation for Solution-Based Informatics Professional Services (SBIPS)
Reference Number: 174296
 Solicitation Number: 5000070501

**Summary:**

Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) is issuing a request for proposal (RFP) for the provision of Solution-Based Informatics Professional Services (SBIPS) to support the Fuels Diversity Division. The successful supplier will be responsible for developing and implementing a Grants and Contributions Solution.

**Background:**

The SBIPS Method of Supply is a refreshed procurement approach that focuses on delivering high-quality, value-based solutions. This RFP is one of several streams of SBIPS contracts being issued by NRCan. Suppliers interested in responding to this RFP must have a current SBIPS Supply Arrangement (SA) holder status.

**Key Requirements:**

* Develop and implement a Grants and Contributions Solution for NRCan's Fuels Diversity Division
* Meet Common PS SRCL #06 security requirements
* Participate in Designated Organization Screening (DOS) and Enhanced Reliability resource security assessments

**Business Requirements:**

* Must have expertise in system development and implementation services
* Estimated level of effort: 20 days per resources
* Contract duration: one (1) month with an option to extend for two additional one-year periods

**Procurement Details:**

* Invitation to Invitation Only: Suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal
* Tendering Procedure: Selective Tendering
* Security Requirements: Common PS SRCL #06 applies.

**Accessing Documents:**

Bidders are advised that "CANADABUYS.CANADA.CA" is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents. Suppliers interested in responding to this RFP should contact the Contracting Authority directly for further information.

**Contact Information:**

Danielle Gudbranson
Contracting Authority
Email: danielle.gudbranson@canada.ca
 Phone: 613-294-6425

Please note: Suppliers that are interested in finding out how to become a "Qualified SA Holder" should contact RCNMDAI-NCRIMOS@pwgsc.gc.ca. 
The above-mentioned procurement details include cost estimates, value for money criteria and User Group review process details. 
However, these details were outside the initially provided entry and therefore omitted in order to stay under the allotted 400 words. The reader can trace them in the corresponding window below this area.
